mapper.insert: insert into al_role (role_id, role_name, description, role_status, create_date) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, description, role_status, create_date from al_role
